name: biohazard4050.org
description: The website for FRC team Biohazard 4050

scripts.minifycss: cssnano css/main.css dist/css/main.css && csso dist/css/main.css dist/css/main.css
scripts.minify: uglifyjs js/* -o dist/js/main.js && cssnano css/main.css dist/css/main.css && csso dist/css/main.css dist/css/main.css && html-minifier --input-dir ~/programming/web/biohazard4050.org-org --output-dir dist --file-ext html -c htmlmin.config
